title: If you want me to stop making post then have someone help me
content:
I am getting tired of being told replace this file with this

does it read firefox expert or intermediate on my account? no it does not it reads a person with no knowleage or skills in this field

and you are basically expecting them to figure this out on their own by giving the smallest shread of help by saying "replace the loginsjson with the logins-backupjson"

Yet i have no idea on how to do that.

so you basically caused a blind student who has no idea what there doing

because the F...ing instructors arent giving descriptive detail instruction on how to perform the task

and its actually sad i have to even do this

so for the last time please will someone give detail instruction on how to replace the loginsjson in the profile folder with the logins-backupjson that is on my desktop screen

and its not like i can just search this because iv tried and what do you know its given as much help as you have
creator: thespiankyle550086

title: 5,000 "mobile" bookmarks aren't transferrable from laptop to laptop (fire.to chrome/icloud)
content:
HI...I have over 6,000 bookmarks, created as files within a single folder on firefox over the past 30 years, all of which were created on one macbook or three. I migrated Firefox to them (as well as a iphone or even Amazon Fire) without their being ruined..don't understand why they, and any other folder on the macbook show under head category of 'mobile bookmarks'. That seems contradictory. B/C I was concerned about the lack of support on firefox (and my mail server-another story), I noticed these files and the folder do not transfer, say, to Chrome (or icloud). 

   What little info there is on mobile bookmarks doesn't have real workaround.  I tried creating HTML or JSON folders on my desk top but those too aren't picked up by another browser like Chrome...furthermore, Firefox "export bookmarks" doesn't allow individual folders to be exported, only the whole lot (except those mobile ones!).    NO one told me using sync (or even icloud for storing desktop files/folders) would mean I can never export to other browsers!
creator: buggeroff6969

title: Instagram Travando
content: Estou tendo um problema quando abro o Reels no instagram. Sempre começa a carregar o site infinitamente até chegar em uma mensagem de que a página está indisponível, ou que houve um erro. Antes eu conseguia resolver limpando os Cookies e Cache, mas agora simplesmente não resolve de jeito nenhum.
creator: gomesluan2016
